html:
Aug 4 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Legrand, Sodexo and Teleperformance, on Wednesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Capita Plc CPI.L: Barclays reinstates coverage with overweight rating; target price 80p

* Legrand LEGD.PA: Berenberg cuts to hold from buy

* Societe Generale SA SOGN.PA: Exane BNP Paribas raises to outperform from neutral

* Sodexo EXHO.PA: Berenberg raises target price to EUR 87 from EUR 86

* Teleperformance SE TEPRF.PA: Credit Suisse raises target price to EUR 390 from EUR 350

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Wednesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.
